title: What are some really fun top laners that dont have a high pick or ban rate (pick rate under 5%).
body: Some build suggestions are also welcome.

replies.body:
Trundle is fun 

I like going titanic hydra, frozen mallet, black cleaver, spirit visage, randuins

Go tank Karma and everyone will hate you. It's amusing.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dtgPk9Nvff4

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sojaZh3sPbU

{{champion:83}}  - {{item:3078}} {{item:3512}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3026}} 

Does well in almost every matchup. Strong pick, fun, rarely used.

Sion is both fun and considered one of the most well-balanced champions in the game.

Expect good Darius players to shit on you though if you go with that.
I would say Nautilus, Jax and Trundle.
{{champion:420}}  She plays a bit differently than most champs as you really need to know how to position youself with her and land your e but she is also amazingly fun to play.

**Yorick** with a 2.61% Pick, and a 0.47% Ban.
**Nautilus** with a 4.61% Pick Top, and a 1.43% Ban.
**Elise**, who currently doesn't have significant stats for top. 
**Trundle** with a 3.07% Pick Top, and a 0.33% Ban.
**Sion** with a 2.33% Pick Top, and a 0.11% Ban.
**Wukong** with a 2.08% Pick Top, and a 0.21% Ban.
{{champion:83}}  is actually a really fun champ right now, lots of sustain and base damages.
Singed start dark seal and whatever potions. Build Ryliandries and swiftly boots with a spirit visage and dead mans
